data.name: Count Pumpcula Demo
data.detailed_description:
Embark on an exciting 2D-Metroidvania journey through the Eastern Archipelago of Lanthir Range! Along the way you’ll need to save the Sagelings from a dark curse in the forest of Orn, fight prehistoric creatures that were thought to be extinct, escape the beasts that lie within the Isle of Orad, and slide through the icy catacombs of Krakens Pass. In your down time, relax with charming new companions on the enchanting Island of Travellers Cove.

about the creator


Count Pumpcula is the passion-project of artist and self-taught Indie developer, Luke Edwards. Combining his love of gaming with his creativity, he has spent the past year single-handedly developing every aspect of this game. Join the journey and immerse yourself in this amazing product of his imagination.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.20 GHz
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Driver
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: standard

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacBook Pro
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: standard

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750 or better
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard
